actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
House Committee on Foreign Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution commending the Royal Thai Government for its extraordinary humanitarian contribution to the large, diverse refugee community in Thailand and for its continued willingness to remain a country of first asylum open to those fleeing repressive regimes in Indochina.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives: (1) commends the Royal Thai Government for its humanitarian contribution to the refugee community in Thailand and for its willingness to remain a country of first asylum to those fleeing repressive regimes in Indochina; and (2) on behalf of the U.S. people, expresses support for the work of the Royal Thai Government to ensure greater stability in Southeast Asia, particularly through the efforts to alleviate the plight of refugees from Indochina.

titles.title: A resolution commending the Royal Thai Government for its extraordinary humanitarian contribution to the large, diverse refugee community in Thailand and for its continued willingness to remain a country of first asylum open to those fleeing repressive regimes in Indochina.
